00019 template <class BaseComponent>
00020 class TMessageDelegatorComp: public BaseComponent, virtual public ilog::IMessageConsumer
00021 {
00022 public:
00023        typedef BaseComponent BaseClass;
00024 
00025        I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(TMessageDelegatorComp);
00026               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(ilog::IMessageConsumer);
00027               I_ASSIGN(m_slaveMessageConsumerCompPtr, "SlaveMessageConsumer", "Slave message consumer", false, "SlaveMessageConsumer");
00028        I_END_COMPONENT;
00029 
00030        // reimplemented (ilog::IMessageConsumer)
00031        virtual bool IsMessageSupported(
00032                             int messageCategory = -1,
00033                             int messageId = -1,
00034                             const istd::IInformationProvider* messagePtr = NULL) const;
00035        virtual void AddMessage(const MessagePtr& messagePtr);
00036 
00037 protected:
00038        I_REF(ilog::IMessageConsumer, m_slaveMessageConsumerCompPtr);
00039 };

00046 template <class BaseComponent>
00047 bool TMessageDelegatorComp<BaseComponent>::IsMessageSupported(
00048                      int messageCategory,
00049                      int messageId,
00050                      const istd::IInformationProvider* messagePtr) const
00051 {
00052        if (m_slaveMessageConsumerCompPtr.IsValid()){
00053               return m_slaveMessageConsumerCompPtr->IsMessageSupported(messageCategory, messageId, messagePtr);
00054        }
00055 
00056        return true;
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 template <class BaseComponent>
00061 void TMessageDelegatorComp<BaseComponent>::AddMessage(const MessagePtr& messagePtr)
00062 {
00063        if (m_slaveMessageConsumerCompPtr.IsValid()){
00064               return m_slaveMessageConsumerCompPtr->AddMessage(messagePtr);
00065        }
00066 }
